page.title: 08Recreation
page.content: The sports complex in Hilda May Avenue aims to provide everyone-adults, children and families-with facilties for keeping fit and having fun. There is a main pool,of competition standard, with a diving area,also a teaching pool used by many schools in the area. The sports complex provides opportunities to play badminton,indoor football, volley ball,netball,basketball,table tennis and squash. There are weight training facilities and a sauna and solarium suite. At certain times a creche is open where young children are cared for whilst parents join in sports. There are refreshments available and a liscensed bar is open evenings and weekends. Many clubs use these facilities and there are also courses of instruction in many sports and fun days for children school holidays.
